means: 在全国范围内，全国性地

sentence.Network_cn: 总统在全国的人气目前正处于历史最低点。
这个节目曾在全国播放过。

entry.def: National means relating to the whole of a country or nation rather than to part of it or to other nations.

example.ex: Ruling parties have lost ground in national and local elections.
example.tran: 执政党在全国和地区选举中均败北。

entry.def: National means typical of the people or customs of a particular country or nation.

example.ex: ...the national characteristics and history of the country...
example.tran: 这个国家的民族特征和历史
棒球是全民性的休闲运动。

entry.def: You can refer to someone who is legally a citizen of a country as a national of that country.

example.tran: 出生于斯里兰卡的英国国民

means.word_mean: 1. with regard to a nation taken as a whole;

auth_sentence.content: Political polls say the race is very close nationally.

auth_sentence.content: The collective dispute procedure had been agreed nationally.

means.word_mean: 在全国范围内;全国性地

sentences.en: The place is nationally known for its melons and fruit,especially its seedless grapes.
sentences.cn: 这里的瓜果,尤其是无核葡萄驰名全国。

sentences.en: The President’s speech was broadcast nationally.
sentences.cn: 总统的演说在全国广播。

sentences.en: Blacks and other nationally oppressed peoples
sentences.cn: 黑人及其他遭受民族压迫的各族人民
